echecs

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • echecs.Piece

  • public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a chess piece. A piece has a name, a code, a color and a set of move possibility.

    Code description :
    k : King
    q : Queen
    b : Bishop
    r : Rook
    n : Knight
    p : Pawn

    Shatranj :
    a : Shah (king)
    c : Farzin (queen)
    d : Fil (bishop)
    e : Faras (knight)
    f : Roukh (rook)
    g : Baidaq (pawn)

    Chaturanga :
    h : Rajag (king)
    i : Mantri (queen)
    j : Gaja (bishop)
    l : Ma (knight)
    m : Ratha (rook)
    o : Padati (pawn)
    Author:
    Acevedo Roman and Guillemot Baptiste, based on Delepoulle Samuel's code.

      • Piece

        public Piece(java.lang.String name,
             char code)
        Create a piece by its name, code and color
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the piece
        code - Code of the piece (Uppercase if white, Lowercase if black)

      • Piece

        public Piece(java.lang.String name,
             char code,
             boolean depHor,
             boolean depVer,
             boolean depDiag,
             boolean backward,
             boolean horse)
        Build a chess piece with a name, a code, a color, and its possible moves Used to create the specimen pieces in the chessboard easily
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the piece
        code - Code of the piece
        couleur - Color of the piece
        depHor - Whether it can move horizontally or not
        depVer - Whether it can move vertically or not
        depDiag - Whether it can move in diagonal or not
        backward - Whether it can move backward or not
        horse - Whether it has knight's move set

      • Piece

        public Piece(java.lang.String name,
             char code,
             int minX,
             int maxX,
             int minY,
             int maxY,
             int minDiag,
             int maxDiag,
             boolean backward,
             boolean horse)
        Build a chess piece with a name, a code, a color, and its possible moves Used to create the specimen pieces in the chessboard
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the piece
        code - Code of the piece
        minX - Minimum horizontal dep capacity
        maxX - Maximum horizontal dep capacity
        minY - Minimum vertical dep capacity
        maxY - Maximum vertical dep capacity
        minDiag - Minimum diagonal dep capacity
        maxDiag - Maximum diagonal dep capacity
        backward - Whether it can move backward
        horse - Whether it has knight's move set

      • Piece

        public Piece(java.lang.String name,
             char code,
             boolean horse)
        Constructor mainly used for the knight. I call it : "The Horse builder", it does sound kinda awesome for me ! And it's very ingenious cause a knight is riding a horse, so when you construct (or build ;) ) a knight, you have to build the horse too ! I could have call it "The Armorsmith" too, following this
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the piece
        code - Code of the piece
        horse - Says that it has horse's move set
